channel.title: Server Hosting! Help Plz! Having Problems!
channel.description:
ok im trying to host my server...... i have an ip address and a port..... so i open a command prompt and start server..... in the command prompt it says Starting (my server name) server on 0.0.0.0:5555 (and to let u know my port is 5555)
30min....later.........it still says that!!!!!! it never changes!!!!!!! it doesnt evn say like server is running after it..it alwayz just says starting blablablabla...it never changes.... so i tried to log on my server...but it says its down!!!!!! so i assume that there is something else that comes up after it says starting server blablablabla.... also when i try to start server my ipconfig doesnt work.......u think that may be my problem??? if so plz tell me how to fix it.......... and if thats not my problem and somethun else is...plz plz plz tell me how to fix it so i can get my server started and running!!!! PLZ PLZ HELP!!!!!! :(

item.title: Server Hosting! Help Plz! Having Problems!
item.dc:creator: @OWNER_2007 OWNER 2007
item.description:
@OWNER_2007 wrote:

Alright, listen CAREFULY, when you click on runserver or what ever, its meant to say

Starting pimpscape server on 0.0.0.0:5555
Its meant to be there! It means your server is up and running. To get other people to get on, you either have to have is no-ip or hamachi. I recomend hamachi because it has no lag. To get other people on, tell them your ip thats ON TOP of your hamachi window. Log in and wait for them to log in

Read full topic
item.source: Server Hosting! Help Plz! Having Problems!

item.title: Server Hosting! Help Plz! Having Problems!
item.dc:creator: @sykogoth sykogoth
item.description:
@sykogoth wrote:

fayt, the 0.0.0.0 isn’t really the ip of anything. don’t worry about the 0.0.0.0 its nothing, as for your port tho… you might wanna run on 43594. but no matter what your always gonna have 0.0.0.0 for your ip in the cmd box. Now when you run hamachi or no-ip it gives a differnt ip for players… and yourself to connect to. cause only you can connect to “0.0.0.0” from your computer. you can’t change it, and i don’t see why you would want to change it.

If you wanna learn more on the subject, go look for a tut on no-ip… or maybe if there isn’t on one for hamachi i’ll make you one.

Hope this helps solve your misunderstanding

Read full topic

item.title: Server Hosting! Help Plz! Having Problems!
item.dc:creator: @Haxor_X Haxor X
item.description:
@Haxor_X wrote:

thats it just log in…fill in server ip with your no-ip…
then if your using moparscape client…
click file
click newport
enter 5555 as new port then click ok
then log in…

Read full topic
